name: Un-Named Platformer
description:
Un-Named Platformer is, at its core, a basic platformer. I am not a great game developer and am just starting out, and this game is not great either I bet. I am trying to learn how to keep my footing in the game creation world, and this is my first release to you all!

Created with Electron

Current Version: v0.0.5

  • Basic enemy framework added
  • End level gates in some levels added (finally!)

Controls:

KeyActionW/UP ARROW/SPACEJUMPA/LEFT ARROWMOVE LEFTD/RIGHT ARROWMOVE RIGHTSHIFTRUN+/-(TEMP) JUMP BACK
AND FORTH BETWEEN
LEVELS

Thank you!
